languages.text: Процедура оценки продолжается так же мучительно медленно, но терпение Вольного Торговца служит примером для подражания прочим правителям.
The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.
languages.original_text: Процедура оценки продолжается так же мучительно медленно, но терпение Вольного Торговца служит примером для подражания прочим правителям.

traits.locale_text: The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.
The ruling circles readily adopt your philosophy.

languages.text: La procédure d'évaluation s'avère aussi lente que pénible, mais la patience dont fait preuve {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est mise en avant comme un exemple à suivre pour tous les souverains des Étendues.
languages.original_text: The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.

traits.locale_text: La procédure d'évaluation s'avère aussi lente que pénible, mais la patience dont fait preuve {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est mise en avant comme un exemple à suivre pour tous les souverains des Étendues.

languages.text: 評価プロセスは相変わらず苦痛を伴うほどに遅々として進まずにいるが、自由開拓者の忍耐強さは他の支配者の模範として称賛されている。
languages.original_text: The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.

traits.locale_text: 評価プロセスは相変わらず苦痛を伴うほどに遅々として進まずにいるが、自由開拓者の忍耐強さは他の支配者の模範として称賛されている。

languages.text: 尽管评审过程缓慢而痛苦，但行商浪人表现出了过人的耐心，被盛赞为所有统治者的榜样。
languages.original_text: The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.

traits.locale_text: 尽管评审过程缓慢而痛苦，但行商浪人表现出了过人的耐心，被盛赞为所有统治者的榜样。

languages.text: El proceso de tasación sigue siendo lento y doloroso, pero la paciencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente es alabada como ejemplo a seguir por los otros gobernantes.
languages.original_text: The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.

traits.locale_text: El proceso de tasación sigue siendo lento y doloroso, pero la paciencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente es alabada como ejemplo a seguir por los otros gobernantes.

languages.text: Der Bewertungsprozess geht ebenso langsam, zäh und schmerzvoll weiter, doch die Geduld {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird als Vorbild für andere Herrscher gelobt.
languages.original_text: The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.

traits.locale_text: Der Bewertungsprozess geht ebenso langsam, zäh und schmerzvoll weiter, doch die Geduld {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird als Vorbild für andere Herrscher gelobt.

languages.text: Değerlendirme süreci yavaş ve zorlu geçse de Hür Tacir'in sabrı, diğer tüm hükümdarlar için emsal niteliğinde oluşuyla takdir topluyor.
languages.original_text: The appraisal process carries on just as slowly and painfully, but the Rogue Trader's patience is praised as an example for other rulers.
